content.value:
I was trying to look up how to spell “pharaoh” in hieroglyphics and came across this Unicode character which is funnier than the joke i was planning to make. 

The character:
𓂸
content.html: I was trying to look up how to spell “pharaoh” in hieroglyphics and came across this Unicode character which is funnier than the joke i was planning to make. The character: 𓂸
